class LotteryManager {
    constructor() {
        this.participants = [];
        this.winners = [];
        this.currentMode = 'single';
        this.maxWinners = 1;
        this.animationId = null;
        this.isAnimating = false;
        
        this.initEventListeners();
        this.loadParticipants();
    }
    
    // æŠ½å¥–æ ¸å¿ƒç®—æ³•
    drawLots() {
        if (this.participants.length === 0) {
            alert('è¯·å…ˆæ·»åŠ å‚ä¸è€…ï¼');
            return;
        }
        
        const availableParticipants = this.participants.filter(
            p => !this.winners.includes(p)
        );
        
        if (availableParticipants.length === 0) {
            alert('æ‰€æœ‰å‚ä¸è€…éƒ½å·²ä¸­å¥–ï¼');
            return;
        }
        
        this.startAnimation(availableParticipants);
    }
    
    // åŠ¨ç”»æ•ˆæœå®ç°
    startAnimation(participants) {
        this.isAnimating = true;
        const duration = 2000; // 2ç§’åŠ¨ç”»
        const interval = 100; // æ¯100msåˆ‡æ¢ä¸€æ¬¡
        const startTime = Date.now();
        
        const animate = () => {
            const elapsed = Date.now() - startTime;
            
            if (elapsed < duration) {
                // éšæœºæ˜¾ç¤ºå‚ä¸è€…çš„åå­—
                const randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * participants.length);
                document.getElementById('nameDisplay').textContent = participants[randomIndex];
                
                this.animationId = setTimeout(animate, interval);
            } else {
                // åŠ¨ç”»ç»“æŸï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºæœ€ç»ˆç»“æœ
                const winnerIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * participants.length);
                const winner = participants[winnerIndex];
                
                document.getElementById('nameDisplay').textContent = winner;
                this.winners.push(winner);
                this.saveWinners();
                
                this.isAnimating = false;
            }
        };
        
        animate();
    }
}

// æ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥å¯¼å‡ºåŠŸèƒ½
exportParticipants() {
    const data = {
        participants: this.participants,
        winners: this.winners

        type: 'application/json'

    const a = document.createElement('a');
    a.href = url;
    a.download = `æŠ½å¥–æ•°æ®_${new Date().toLocaleDateString()}.json`;
    a.click();
    
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
}

// æœ¬åœ°å­˜å‚¨ç®¡ç†
saveToLocalStorage() {
    localStorage.setItem('lotteryParticipants', JSON.stringify(this.participants));

}

// åŠ è½½æœ¬åœ°æ•°æ®
loadFromLocalStorage() {
    const participants = localStorage.getItem('lotteryParticipants');

        this.participants = JSON.parse(participants);
    }
    
    if (winners) {
        this.winners = JSON.parse(winners);

}

class HistoryManager {
    constructor() {

    // æ·»åŠ å†å²è®°å½•
    addRecord(drawTime, mode, participants, winners) {

            winners: [...winners],

    updateHistoryDisplay() {

                <div class="history-mode">${record.mode === 'single' ? 'å•äººæ¨¡å¼' : 'å¤šäººæ¨¡å¼'}</div>
                <div class="history-details">
                    ä» ${record.participantCount} äººä¸­é€‰å‡º ${record.winnerCount} äºº
                </div>
                <div class="history-winners">
                    è·å¥–è€…ï¼š${record.winners.join(', ')}
                </div>
            </div>
        `).join('');
    }
}

exportData() {
    const data = {

        winners: this.winners,
        settings: this.getCurrentSettings(),

importData(file) {

    reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {

            if (!data.participants || !Array.isArray(data.participants)) {
